scripts.run-allure:dev01: npm run delete-allure-results & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=dev01 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/Regression_1/**/*.js & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=dev01 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/Regression_2/**/*.js
scripts.run-allure:dev02: npm run delete-allure-results & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=dev02 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/Regression_1/**/*.js & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=dev02 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/Regression_2/**/*.js
scripts.run-allure:qa01: npm run delete-allure-results & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=qa01 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/Regression_1/**/*.js & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=qa01 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/Regression_2/**/*.js
scripts.run-allure:qa02: npm run delete-allure-results & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=qa02 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/Regression_1/**/*.js & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=qa02 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/Regression_2/**/*.js
scripts.run-allure:dev01:workflowonly: npm run delete-allure-results & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=dev01 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/10_BusinessUsecase/*.js --headed
scripts.run-allure:dev02:workflowonly: npm run delete-allure-results & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=dev02 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/10_BusinessUsecase/*.js --headed
scripts.run-allure:qa01:workflowonly: npm run delete-allure-results & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=qa01 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/10_BusinessUsecase/*.js --headed
scripts.run-allure:qa02:workflowonly: npm run delete-allure-results & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=qa02 --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/10_BusinessUsecase/*.js --headed
scripts.run-allure:stg: npm run delete-allure-results & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=stg --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Non_Prod/10_BusinessUsecase/*.js
scripts.run-allure:prod: npm run delete-allure-results & npx cypress run --env ADVAQAENV=prod --spec ./cypress/e2e/ui/Prod/11_Production/*.js --headed
scripts.cy:run:test:ui:dev01: npm run run-allure:dev01 & npm run report:generate
scripts.cy:run:test:ui:dev02: npm run run-allure:dev02 & npm run report:generate
scripts.cy:run:test:ui:qa01: npm run run-allure:qa01 & npm run report:generate
scripts.cy:run:test:ui:qa02: npm run run-allure:qa02 & npm run report:generate
scripts.cy:run:test:ui:dev01:workflowonly: npm run run-allure:dev01:workflowonly & npm run report:generate
scripts.cy:run:test:ui:dev02:workflowonly: npm run run-allure:dev02:workflowonly & npm run report:generate
scripts.cy:run:test:ui:qa01:workflowonly: npm run run-allure:qa01:workflowonly & npm run report:generate
scripts.cy:run:test:ui:qa02:workflowonly: npm run run-allure:qa02:workflowonly & npm run report:generate
scripts.cy:run:test:ui:stg: npm run run-allure:stg & npm run report:generate
scripts.cy:run:test:ui:prod: npm run run-allure:prod & npm run report:generate
